website_summaries.verdict: Good option if you want inexpensive carpet mats with plenty of color options.
pros: Inexpensive with lots of colors available
Generic enough to fit most cars
cons: They aren't designed to be trimmed so they might not fit well in some cars

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for! Buy cheap, receive cheap....... no left or right on front mats. Both same. Back piece doesn't fit even after submitting vehicle specifics. One thing, they will be put to use while I continue to look for a better look and a better fit!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Fiveash

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and effort to make them fit!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Extremely light rubber that came apart within 2 weeks of wear. Pieces were coming off and wore through to the carpet beneath. The edge height is right - except to make it fit you cut off at least one side making the edges very thin. The wear was at my drivers heel - took 4 years for my OEM set to wear out. And since over 30 days by a few the company / Amazon says "too bad - you lose"!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbypu

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a Mazda 3
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my car and I was very careful to read the description and make sure this was the right one.
customer_reviews.author: Blairnod87

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my 2007 Saab 9-3.
customer_reviews.text: This was matched via Amazon search for my 2007 Saab 9-3. Does not fit my car well. Size is too small and will cause spills when snow melts. Specially for the rear mat since the middle section is too short and ridges aren't that deep . Inaccurate posted measurements of (Front 27" x 18", Rear 17" x 54"). Front mats are actually 17.5" in width. No big deal, but the rear is only 51" in total. Note that the rear mat has a middle section that is only 15" in width that is connected to the rear mats that are 18" each. So depending how high your car's hump is, this may or may not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: UNBIASED REVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: The smell is horrible..
customer_reviews.text: The smell is horrible... I messed up and put them in the back of my truck to let them air out, because it was overwhelming inside the truck. 2 days in the back of my truck and the smell never went away. And due to the southern heat, one of the mats started to curl up. I would return them, but one of them flew out of the back of my truck while driving around with them back there. I threw the other two away. Complete and total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: SamHain

customer_reviews.title: They don't fit !
customer_reviews.text: Good quality,good price. Was assured they would fit my 2010 Honda Accord...The term " fit" is relative I guess. Do they go in? Yep. Do they "fit"? No. I wanted the connected piece in the backseat,to cover the hump. In order to get it to cover the hump,it buckles the side pieces,and causes them to go partway up the back seat leaving the part where your feet go, partially uncovered.if I push the side pieces further forward,the hump piece rides up the back of the console. Tried turning them around just for kicks,nope. My only option at this point is cut them in half,which defeats the purpose. Also front mats very narrow many inches from edge to edge.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible rubber smell.
customer_reviews.text: Product does not fit my 2015 Prius 2 well. It is a bit smaller than what I needed but it does the job. When opening, the floor mats have this rubber smell that really over powers everything. I’ve had these mats in the car for a week and they still smell. Right now, the smell is so bad that it is giving me headaches while I drive. They’re not bad for the price but I suggest to try airing them out for a couple of weeks before putting it in the car. I most likely will replace these.
customer_reviews.author: rach

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, stinks link chemicals!
customer_reviews.text: They fit surprisingly well in my 2003 Jeep Liberty but they smell like chemicals so bad. It's been over 2 weeks now and the Jeep stinks everytime you get in it. It's so bad it gives my gf headaches. Sucks because they are a nice fit for ~$15. I just don't know what to do about the smell. I'm going to try washing them and if that doesn't help the smell I'll return them. update: these still smell. updated from 4 stars to 2 because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Not Me

customer_reviews.title: Not my best order
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought the mats I entered my car model and year it said it would fit. Considering that i did buy it on amazon prime deal day it was super cheap price . Once it arrived all the mats were bound by and extra pice or rubber and two screws you cut off to separate the mats. Well such a wonder thing let me tell you as I was Separating the mats with scissors the actual Mats tore on the thinner grooves easier than paper. (yes parts are that thin)put the two front mats on top of factory carpet mats these mats left about two inches uncovered.
customer_reviews.author: Cbamaz

customer_reviews.title: Car mats
customer_reviews.text: I really like these mats, they are thick rubber and looks nice. The only thing that I don't care for is that the drivers side mat wants to wrinkle up easily. It doesn't seem to be grabbing onto the carpet to remain flat. I have had to adjust it each time I drive. Of course, this is happening because of my feet on the mat, but it is annoying
customer_reviews.author: karen earls

customer_reviews.title: Wrong mat
customer_reviews.text: They're nice mats, they fit my back seat and passenger seat well. Hoping they do well for the winter. Only issue I have is I was sent two passenger side shaped mats, so I have one mat that fits perfectly and one mat that is lopsided and fits terribly because it's a second passenger side mat...
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Returned unopened and ordered another more expensive product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these and then after doing a little research and reviewing comments by other customers, I decided to send this product back UNOPENED. Other reviewers said this didn't fit on my 2016 Mazda CX3 despite reading they did on the Amazon site. After deliberating the pros and cons I ordered a far more expensive item. Sometimes its better to spend the extra money. I didn't like that this product arrived in a plastic bag. Had I opened the bag up I have no idea how I would have returned this without incurring personal expense.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Lacourse

customer_reviews.title: If you have Ford fusion 2017/18 don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: The rubber does not look bad at all. But the sizing is horrible, I bought this one because it said it fits Ina Ford fusion 2017 but even if you cut in the lines it does not fit at all and specially the side of the driver it fits terribly and this can cause accidents. It's a good option for a cheaper mat, but if you have Ford fusion just skip buying this one! And the fact you have to cut makes a trap because you can't return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Good for price, not best with a manual unless you like adrenaline
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and pretty thick. The rubber is not that durable though. I pivot on my left foot for the clutch in my sweet ride and wore a hole slap through it in less than a month. Also does not grip well to carpet and crumpled up under the petals causing multiple near death experiences. I bought some mat holder clamps and was about to put them in but the hole that I wore through the rubber was kinda a deal breaker. See Pic.
customer_reviews.author: P Diddy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price! Thick, sturdy, pliable.  They may need to be trimmed, but there are outlines in the pattern for this.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it can't be beat. They are pretty thick and they are pliable enough that they will lay flat. Little rubber spikes on the back make it not slide around. But they are not stock and may need to be trimmed to fit perfectly. If you buy this for your high end new car you will likely be disappointed. If you look closely at that photos there are many little sections that can be trimmed off to make it fit right.
customer_reviews.author: Sirhc Tnra

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit my car too narrow and short
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't consider this heavy duty as it looks cheap but considering the price I can't be mad. This doesn't fit my car or any car in general as it says "this fit your car" its too narrow for the front Mats and its too short for the back seat it barely covered my floor. This only will fit small cars such as compact cars but not sedans I give them 5 stars for the customer service since they reached out me and allowed me to explain my frustration. When they come up with updated mats and fix the sizing issue I'll definitely buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product- Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a matching cargo space one for my 2006 Toyota Highlander. Here are my thoughts: Pro: - Easy to install - Easy to adjust (cut the channels to adjust to the size of your vehiclular area) - Does a pretty good job of catching debris and water (used it from the beach with sand, wet items, small spills)- easy to clean and it keeps items from running off the sides onto the carpet - I heard some had a smell but mine had no problems Cons: - The driver/passenger floor ones were a little small but fit the main areas nicely
customer_reviews.author: Cgot

customer_reviews.title: These things smell AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: The nasty smell just will not go away from these floor mats. I have washed them, soaked them, laid them in the sun outside to air out. No matter what I have tried they stink like funky, oily rubber or old tires. You can smell them from several feet away. I haven't been able to put them in my car due to the awful smell. Hopefully I'll find some use for them on the homestead. Maybe a mat by the pool or something. No way I can ride in an enclosed space with that funky stank!
customer_reviews.author: Jason M Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Do not fit or even barely fit!
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality and it said they were made for a Honda Odyssey, but they really don’t fit very well. I wanted them for winter to cover my carpet in my Honda so they should work okay for that this winter. After using these to keep snow off my carpet underneath, they do not fit my Honda Odyssey. The front mat is 4-5 inches too narrow so they hardly protect anything but the center where no one sits! Do not buy, a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cjones

customer_reviews.title: Terrible odor
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these to anyone who can smell anything. They smell terrible. After trying them in the car, we let them sit in the garage for a couple months, then let them sit outside in the sun for a few more weeks and they are still awful. The whole car smells like burnt rubber whenever we tried to put them in the car. Yuck! After 8 months they are still nauseating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for a Nissan Pathfinder
customer_reviews.text: I have a few issues with this product. I bought it for my Nissasn Pathfinder because they said it would fit. It doesn't quite cover the driver's side floor. No where did it say I would have to cut it to fit in the description. I ended up having to trim it. I bought this after seeing if they would fit and was disappointed to see they needed adjusted. They seem really thin in comparison to other brands. They do have a slight odor even though they were to be odorless. I'm going to see how they hold up so the rating could change.
customer_reviews.author: gr8heron

customer_reviews.title: Strong tar like smell - NASTY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Strong chemical smell before opening package. All I can compare it to is the smell of tar, or freshly laid asphalt. I opened the package and let them air out for 3 days. Nothing changed. I cannot imagine getting into my vehicle and smelling these things on a hot summer day when they are extremely horrible smelling on a cool day. I’d have to pay $6 to return these. They were $18 to purchase. Not worth my time or effort. This seller is officially on the do not buy list.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie W

customer_reviews.title: Great mats for price!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people said that these mats had a horrible smell that never went away. Upon opening I smelled a rubber smell. Not to surprising since they were in a closed bag. I put them in truck, not perfect fit and back but does the job. The smell, even after being closed in the hot truck, is barley noticeable after 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit; didn't seem durable; tossed.
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my Dodge Journey even thought the Amazon site corresponded that it did. Not great material either..looked like rough rubber that would crack in the winter. Tossed them and went to Weathertech. Worth the money vs these not-fitting, not long-lasting cheapos.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Middle

customer_reviews.title: Sanky but effective
customer_reviews.text: The smell was STRONG. I let them air out in the garage for a week and it still had some smell for a little while. Had to trim the pad for the driver side as it interfered with the peddle/left foot rest. They slide forward, so adjustment is needed once a week. BUT, keeps the floor clean and that's why we're all here, right
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the ruggedness, trimmable for a very good fit and the price. 5 stars all the way
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thick, they don't wreak like ooly urethane plastic like the last set I bought which smelled up my car for months and not in a good way. I bought these for my Xterra which is a 2007 and still smells new and is immacukate and not even 90,000 on it yet so I'm very happy with the rugged ess, the timmable corners and sides etc for a very good fit and the price was very reasonable. 5 stars all the way
customer_reviews.author: Faslane Tech

customer_reviews.title: These mats are a perfect fit for my 2018 Jeep Cherokee Latitude
customer_reviews.text: These mats are a perfect fit for my 2018 Jeep Cherokee Latitude. I’m somewhat skeptical when I read statements claiming that this will fit that, and the like. This product arrived as stated and I couldn’t be happier with purchase. Good luck finding anything on the market as great and inexpensive as this!
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: These are a great value. Probably one of my best purchases ever
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value. Probably one of my best purchases ever. The quality is excellent. Heavy mats and good fit. I bought a set for my son and myself. My friend got into my car the other day and asked if I had got a different car. I have light carpet and bought the Black Mats. I have a nice car but the previous owner trashed the carpeted mats.
customer_reviews.author: Cearles

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product that far exceeded my expectations for the cost of the product!! Anyone complaining about them not fitting their vehicle obviously have no idea that these are made for multiple different vehicles and with a very small amount of effort and a pair of simple sissies, these would fit their vehicles too.
customer_reviews.author: Maurita S.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but fit is “iffy.”
customer_reviews.text: Indicated this “fit” my 1999 Silverado. While they do “fit” they just “fit okay.” The long mat for the extended cab bench is several inches short length-wise. The front mats provide adequate coverage, but don’t take into account some of the contours in the floor. These are adequate replacement for the price but if you are looking for something specifically measured for your vehicle, these might not meet your needs. The quality of the material is good, thickness is adequate, and texture is well designed.
customer_reviews.author: R in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: fits my 2009 honda civic fine. the back fits perfectly and passenger side
customer_reviews.text: fits my 2009 honda civic fine. the back fits perfectly and passenger side. the driver side, it kind of covered a bit of the gas pedal, but if i shift it to the left a bit its fine. replaced my carpt one cause they were so old and even when cleaned still smelled bad. didnt know it was coming from my carpet until a replaced them with these plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice, But.....
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice mats but I couldn’t stand the rubber smell, especially in a closed up car. I washed them and left them outside for two weeks but the odor is still strong. Bought them in early June. Maybe I got a bad batch. I replaced the front with a custom mat and left the one in the back for now. Still smells but not as bad with just the one.
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: GASOLINE SMELL
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunate we wait to much time thinking the Gasoline smell will go away to use it, but it did not. I do not recommend anyone to buy this thing, Car is small closet space how can you design a product with a material that smells like Gasoline? If you buy it do not wait, the smell will not go away...
customer_reviews.author: santiago

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, I honestly say just save up for weather techs but if that’s not in your budget these are great. Took about 6 months of driving for the runner to start coming apart though. Bad design on the rubber lips, but they’re a “get what you pay for” product so overall good.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Matthews

customer_reviews.title: SOOO NOT WORTH IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: These mats were the worst. After a 2 weeks, they cracked in the middle. They weren't as durable as the description stated. I can't review if they were easy to clean because they messed up so quickly. I was disappointed with this purchase. I figured they'd at least last me several months...NOT TWO WEEKS!!! I just threw them away. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not Weathertec quality, a little thin, but it is fine for keep the car clean and dry, and very easy to clean. Let it air out a while before putting in your car to get rid of the rubber smell. Fits fairly well, not perfect, but not bad. My order got lost, but my replacement order arrived quickly. Overall, not a bad value for the price of under $19.
customer_reviews.author: C. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: They are exactly as described but the smell was just to much for me
customer_reviews.text: They are the shape of my 2008 Subaru Impreza outback sport wagon. Buuuut it smells like they were cut and molded the same day I got them. I have never smell rubber stronger then I have when I put them in my the car. I took them out imidiatly and haven’t tryed them in a long time. They are exactly as described but the smell was just to much for me I will try them again I think the smell is gone by now.
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for price.
customer_reviews.text: Looks fine and works well if you trim it carefully. I'd like to see included some kind of filler for the hole you gouge in the rug with your foot. I'd also like to have a couple plastic grommets to attach the pad to the hooks included with my Toyota. I can make holes, but they're not grometted.
customer_reviews.author: nowuss

customer_reviews.title: Good buy not so durable but okay.
customer_reviews.text: It's good to buy to protect the flooring of your vehicle. It's a bit hard to clean and it does last for some time but it's not as durable. Overall it's good to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, poor fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 2018 Subaru Cross Trek. They are thin and flimsy, there is no hole to fit over the floor pins that secure the mat from slipping. The rear mats do not fit over the hump so need to cut them apart. The front mats even when trimmed fit sloppy. I would not recommend these mats at all. Better off going to Subaru for the exact mats for the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: CQP

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price the only thing is since ...
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the price the only thing is since they are generic you need to cut them to fit the driver side floor due to pedals Etc but they are a good quality and they don't stink like some of the other brands from wherever they come from the only reason for the number four is for the trimming and cutting otherwise it's a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for over a year and they have held really well. I like that they fit well and are flexible. They are labeled as “heavy duty” a term that is usually associated with a more rigid type of material. In that sense, these are not rigid but have held very well over the time I had them.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Not as pleased as I should be.
customer_reviews.text: The back mat fits the auto, but the front mats are smaller than the original floor mats, slide some and have no way to attach to the floor. The back cargo mat that I purchased previously for my Honda CR-V was very good, which is why I purchased these mats from the same seller. They'll work, but I'm not nearly as pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Too small for 2003-2008 Toyota Corolla
customer_reviews.text: On a 9th gen Toyota Corolla (2003-2008), the rear mat is about 2 inches too small on each side, which makes the whole thing slide forward about 1 inch in a slight "V" shape. I'm not going to cut the middle because that would completely defeat the purpose of having these mats. Also, the little prongs are too short, which makes it easily slide forward. I'll probably be returning this. Amazon's "compatible with your car" thing lied...
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit so my floor boards are still getting dirty
customer_reviews.text: Got for my 2010 Honda CR-V as this was supposedly compatible. Bad fit so my floor boards are still getting dirty. It saves some dirt from getting to the floor of course, but not enough protection. Can't complain though, that's why they make them for your specific car. Definitely getting the custom HR-V ones for my new car.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Vice

customer_reviews.title: Fit my vehicle, but not heavy duty (do not use for snow)
customer_reviews.text: These are not heavy duty at all:-( I am still using them b/c it seemed like too much of a hassle to return it. They are fine for people that don't track in much, but for those of us battling snow and rain-these do not hold up:-(
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Loooooooove
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fit, durable, clean look, and protects very well. Only problem I'm having with mine is on the drivers side, there is a giant bump in the mat so it wont lie flat down, and I don't know why. I think it got shoved too far up and got molded like that. Other than that it is AMAZING And way cheaper than going to Walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Delayne Adair

customer_reviews.title: My dad ordered these from my account. He bought ...
customer_reviews.text: My dad ordered these from my account. He bought them for his volkswagon jetta and even after trying to cut them, they still wouldn't fit in the car
customer_reviews.author: M. Pannell

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: My order came packaged nicely. The rear mats are one single piece that can fold. All 3 pieces are durable and have held up well. Best thing to have if your doing ridesharing. Easier to clean than cloth mats
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality but rubber smell is bad
customer_reviews.text: The rubber smell is very bad. We have treated them with suggested cleaners ranging from a vinegar wash to Febreeze to letting them sit outside in the sun for two weeks. While the smell has dissipated some, the outgassing of chemicals is taking a long time. On the upside, the mats are well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I like them alot I just wish they had been about 3-4 inches wider for the drivers and passenger side up front. But, I am very pleased. I did alot of research and studied them all for several days before I ordered. They all seem to start looking the same after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Heart

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for my car
customer_reviews.text: I drive a Honda Civic and this was the best thing I could have ordered for my car. It is easy to clean and keeps my car from having stains on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: To work best you would need to cut out the center piece
customer_reviews.text: they say heavy duty rubber which it is but they are not the deep groove type. I bought these for my 2015 Ford Explorer, thinking that the rear matt would go right across and over the hump, but it is to short. To work best you would need to cut out the center piece. I put it in my Ford Edge which does not have the hump and it works great there
customer_reviews.author: Bridget H

customer_reviews.title: mats smell Terrible! and after much difficulty getting them apart (had ...
customer_reviews.text: package arrived damaged and open... mats smell Terrible! and after much difficulty getting them apart (had to cut each one because they were bolted together and could not get bolt off) I read the fine print that stated they contain LEAD and cancer causing chemicals. also.. my car has locking knobs for the mats. these will not work.
customer_reviews.author: goldenmom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with these because they are explicitly described as universal
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with these because they are explicitly described as universal. But that's what they are. They came up as fitting my 2018 f150, which they do, but they would fit almost any vehicle. The fit is nowhere near exact. They are just run of the mill rubber floor mats
customer_reviews.author: crispy

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Product is rather flimsy. While it will provide protection, seems like it would rip or tear if it was really getting used hard on a daily basis. Also, rear mat does NOT fit the Ford Fiesta, contrary to what Amazon said.
customer_reviews.author: Chemgrl08

customer_reviews.title: Toxic odor
customer_reviews.text: Can’t use these because the toxic odor that these mats emits is unbearable. I’ve had it sitting out in the sun for days and it stil smells like gasoline. Looks like they would work fine in my Tacoma but as soon as I shut all doors and windows, forget it. My wife and I could not stand it.
customer_reviews.author: Raban

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I wanted to preserve my carpeting during the rainy season and I must say they work pretty well. I gave it 4 stars because I had to cut the ones for the back in half (maybe I was suppose to) because they looked jumbled and unsightly, but other than that, I am pleased with this product/purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LA TONJA WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: TOXIC AND NAUSEATING ODOR
customer_reviews.text: These mats have such an intense odor that it bleeds through your clothes if in the car more than 15 minutes. Ater one week of use there has been no diminishing. How embarrassing it is to have people be able to detect this outrageously strong chemical (petroleum) odor on your clothes. I take them off at night and it's unbelievable. They are so bad that 5 different people have got in the car and asked we switch automobiles. I cannot believe a company would market and sell such an inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Green

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: I was not very happy with the thickness of these mats. they were good value but for few dollars more I could have gotten better quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Not a perfect fit in the front of my Honda CR-V 2014 but they cover enough the floor and they don't move. Haven't spilled anything yet. The back ones actually fit perfectly however the middle part was too big. Had to cut it in half. I wanted the entire floor covered but I guess you have the option to cut the middle part away
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a 2011 Toyota Camry
customer_reviews.text: These fit the front and back of a 2011 Toyota Camry perfectly, no trimming required. The ones I received do not smell at all. Will have to test the longevity out this winter, but the rubber is definitely heavy so I expect it will last.
customer_reviews.author: content_of_character

customer_reviews.title: Perfect floor mats for my car!
customer_reviews.text: These floor mats are the perfect compliment to the new seat covers I ordered. They are heavy duty and thick. I like how they capture all the dust, dirt, and debris that would normally grind into the fabric covers the car came with. These rubberized covers allow for quick and easy cleaning. I especially like how they are cut-to-fit! You can't go wrong, but I suggest that you make sure they're compatible with your model of vehicle!
customer_reviews.author: Cre8ngLife!

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty rubber! Ultra durable! NOT! First, these gems tear easier than a wet tissue. Second, they are not car specific and fit horribly! In this second failure the easy tearing was a blessing. I simply tore the ends of the back to get it to sorta fit. Otherwise, they seem great.
customer_reviews.author: Edward B Clark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: These auto mats fit perfectly! Although they’re made to be fitted for most applications with the option of cutting them to size, these fit perfect just the way they were! They’re made with great grips so it doesn’t slip under your feet! I recommend this product 100%
customer_reviews.author: Tony L.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good alternative to cheap carpet mats. Easy to clean when you have lots of feet getting in and out of your car, like say an Uber driver. Don’t fit my car as well as I would like but they are universal fit so can’t complain. Easy to trim but wish I had taken more time and thought. For the price a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: 2012 kia soul
customer_reviews.text: They dont fit my 2012 kia soul perfectly, but they come pretty close. They're really nicely made and thick, and the back mat is one large piece to keep the center area clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit in Kia Soul; surprisingly thin material.
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for and I chose the cheapest option. The obvious problem in my case is it states that the floormats will fit in a Kia Soul, but I can tell you firsthand none of the floormats come close to fitting in my 2018 Soul. If they did fit I'm still not sure I wouldn't return them because these, "heavy duty," floormats are at most about 1/4" thick (less in areas with texturing/indentations).
customer_reviews.author: Florida Man

customer_reviews.title: Good for me so far....
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for average use,probably not for the rough and rugged, though. They fit my 09 Ford Escape perfectly. I bought them in warm weather, so I am hoping the freezing weather of winter will not cause these mats to crack. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kizzykizzy

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE!!!! They have the worst smell...like you do not want to breathes this everyday. They have been on my back lawn for almost 2 months and when the wind blows I can still smell them🤢
customer_reviews.author: Angel K.

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: Have had them less than a year initially they had an overwhelming smell of gasoline for a solid month or more inside the interior of my truck now under a year old they are cracking and falling apart in a vehicle I drive just back and forth to work not a work truck by any means but not a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ez2cUrNvUs

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These floor mats were put into a 99 Jeep Wrangler, the two front pads fit perfectly. I cut the back pads down quite a bit but they don't exactly fit the back floor, which is my fault for not measuring correctly. But for the price I still got some pretty decent floor mats.
customer_reviews.author: Some Random Guy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waist your cash
customer_reviews.text: Waist of $20. They said it fit my Jeep. Not even close. Ended up throwing them away and went to Jeep dealer and just paid them full price. I really didn’t expect a lot for $20 but if I had know what I was going to get , I would of just waited and bought the real thing
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The color is great, the thickness is decent
customer_reviews.text: The color is great, the thickness is decent, the appearance I am very happy with for the price. Whats the big catch??? They smell horrible. The plastic chemical smell has taken over my car. I have washed and soaked them with dawn and vinegar and the still are horrible smelling. I have been driving for 6 day now with them and have to have the windows down because of the smell. When I took the mats out overnight to clean them the next morning my car still smelled like they were inside the car and was an overwhelming chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty? Not really.
customer_reviews.text: To call these heavy duty is confusing. Certainly when I got these they looked durable. But with less than a year of use, the drivers side has worn away and now has 4 visible holes in them. Also, when stated they "fit" my 2013 Civic, isn't really true. Yes the front ones fit because of their general style but they slid all over the place. The rear did not fit, and had to cut them down to fit which did not look very good after. Overall, I wouldn't say I'm pleased since I'm now in the market for a new mat set
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kuczaj

customer_reviews.title: The front two floor mats fit good. They stay in place and did not need ...
customer_reviews.text: The front two floor mats fit good. They stay in place and did not need trimming. The rear full mat when placed on the floor because of the center hump on the floor was way too short. If you pulled it to one side, the other was only half covered. I ended up cutting the rear mat into 3 sections. One for the passenger side, one for the driver side, and one for the center of the hump on the floor. With a little trimming it will work, but it certainly does not cover the back floor from side to side like advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spend More for Better Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not the best mats, but good for the price. I own a 2016 Ford Fusion and they fit decently well. They don't cover everything on the floor but it's good enough. People don't usually ride along with me but over the course of a year now I've completely worn through the driver side mat in two locations.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Check the size and reviews per car model. 1 size doesnt fit all.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that it advertisee it fit a 1995 jeep wangler, even though the mats are too big and fold up under my brake and gas pedal. They curl from the heat and they also gave me a long pad for the back seats that didnt fit at all unless it was folded. Would reallyb like a refund. Not sure abiut other car models, but these will not fit in a 95 wrangler. Very disappointed, waste of money on my part. Waste of time. Put the old mats back in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell makes it unusable!!
customer_reviews.text: The product seems pretty durable and fits well for my 2013 Ford Fiesta, but the factory smell was HORRIBLE! It smells like someone smoked all over it for weeks. I left it outside to air out for 3 weeks and then soaked it in dish soap and apple smelling body wash and it didn’t make ANY difference. I wish I could send it back but being that it’s been three weeks it’s hardly likely. Again it’s a good product but the irreversible stench makes it unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Cheap thin and don’t last at all. 4 months is all I got out of these mats before they had holes through them. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: My driver's side mat will not stay still. The teeth on the back of the mat do not ğrip the carpet already in the car. Currently looking into purchasing another set
customer_reviews.author: Bri's Kindle book selection

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Idk if anyone realizes this, but the edges of the front floor mats can be cut to fit your floor. And there’s a specific side for each of the floors. Love my mats. Not too bulky, but sturdy enough to withstand abuse(from my heels!).
customer_reviews.author: Ms. A

customer_reviews.title: does require some trimming for best fit. Feels kind of lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 2012 Hyundai Veloster. Not a 100% fit, does require some trimming for best fit. Feels kind of lightweight, but still solid and flexible. Does have a slight "rubbery" smell for the first few days after you open them. Leave your windows cracked if you can to vent untill the smell wears off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a 2018 Fusion as it claims
customer_reviews.text: As the item description states, “this will fit your 2018 fusion”. No, it does not. Not only is the backseat floor mat not long enough to fit, but the center part is too wide. Doesn’t come close to laying flat or covering the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Good but......
customer_reviews.text: Carpet were good but got damaged too easy and I have to put it away worth 2 month and after that are gone
customer_reviews.author: @ebob

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit 2014 Taureg
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my 2014 Taureg in any way shape or form. Could not trim front on any of the cut lines to make them fit right and the rear was too short width wise by at least 8 inches. I had to cut it into 2 floor mats thet barely protect the rear floor board and the front too were chucked in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price! Beautifully protect my car!
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy rubber protective mat for the price! They fit perfect in my Nissan Rogue perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline T

customer_reviews.title: Fit F350 ok
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price . It fit ok . They slide around a little when climbing in and out. Far better than have no mat. Looks like a good fit for F350 Super Duty 2011. They aren't thick but do the job. Aaac service heating and air is glad to have these mats in the truck.
customer_reviews.author: aaac service

customer_reviews.title: They look and feel like quality mats
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price of these floor mats, I didn't have the highest expectations, but I have to say I was pleasantly surprised. They look and feel like quality mats. They fit in my SUV well and they do not slip or slide. They seem like they would be easy to clean with a hose and overall, I'm very delighted with them.
customer_reviews.author: Aisling Brogan

customer_reviews.title: Mynewmat
customer_reviews.text: Great floor mats.. it fits well on my tundra pick up.. now my carpet and floor mats are protected from any shoes dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy these again.
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for my 2005 Honda Civic and they look really good. I did have to cut the drivers side a little bit it was made really easy with just a pair of scissors. The rear one had to be cut right down the middle, easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Manutter

customer_reviews.title: So you need a box cutter and a good hand and it worked for me
customer_reviews.text: The vehicle generator said it was a fit for my 92 Cherokee but it wasn't until I cut off certain sections which is how it's designed. So you need a box cutter and a good hand and it worked for me. Not bad for $20
customer_reviews.author: paulhead

customer_reviews.title: Smells HORRIBLE!! Gave me a headache!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Not sure how well the product is or holds up because I took them out of my car due to the horrible smell!!! It’s like the smell of moth balls and rubber times 100!!! They have been out of my car for a week and my car still smells so bad that I can smell it on my clothes and in my hair after being in my car! Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The items are heavy duty, and have flawless construction for a long life; and their service staff is excellent in satisfying their customers with any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Vincent Petrelli

customer_reviews.title: Thin, but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This material is thin, but durable. Because it's thin, you can cut it to the size you need easily, and it's pliable so you can fit it in the space you want without any trouble. I use this in my 2014 prius and lay the back-seat ones in one piece, draping it over the middle so it covers the whole surface in the back. This works great for my 2 boys as it catches all the muck from their shoes when they get in the car.
customer_reviews.author: H. Park

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: They fit in my 06 Hummer H3 perfect needs little to no trimming. I was looking for something inexpensive for the winter to cover my tan carpet . I didn't notice a strong smell as others stated.
customer_reviews.author: Joetta McPhall

customer_reviews.title: These floor mats look very nice in my 2003 Ford Mustang
customer_reviews.text: These floor mats look very nice in my 2003 Ford Mustang! One thing that I was worried about was if they would fit properly... To my relief, they are made to adjust to the size. Simply just tear or cut along the many lines you can pick from. If i had to give one suggestion, it would be for the material to be stronger because like i said, you can tear it with your hands if you wanted to. All around though, it's a great product for the price and would definitely recommend it to anyone trying to help protect from spills and make your car look a lot nicer at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Mattos

customer_reviews.title: not bad. There was a strong rubber odor that lingered ...
customer_reviews.text: These don't fit as well as I had hoped but, not bad. There was a strong rubber odor that lingered for quite some time and if it hadn't been winter time in WNY, I would've left them outside to air out before enclosing them in my vehicle and stinking up my car.
customer_reviews.author: Little Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: These fit much better than I expected in my Mitsubishi Mirage
customer_reviews.text: These fit much better than I expected in my Mitsubishi Mirage. They are a heavy rubber, almost foam like, and feel sturdy but not stiff. Easy to trim with just a scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Dane B

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, high quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even need to trim the one for the back seat of my Dodge Journey. I probably should trim a tiny bit for the front passenger side, but don't plan to. Driver side fits well with no trimming either. This set is really sturdy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Rotge

product_meta.title: BDK M783 ProLiner Heavy Duty Rubber Black Car Floor Mats Liner for Auto - All Weather 3 Piece Set
product_meta.description: Color:BlackHeavy Duty thick rubber polymer with our ridges and nibs design keeps dirt, mud, water and debris from creeping onto the carpet floor. These mats keep the front and entire rear flooring clean, leaving no gaps for the ultimate protection. Shaped to fit the contour flooring of most vehicles. Odorless and Non-Toxic, these mats are safe for even the smallest passengers in the car.
feature_bullets: DuraChannel – Durable Grooves to Guard Against Spills, or Debris – Built to Last through Rain, Snow, Mud and More – Anti-Slip Backing – Set of Front & Rear Liners
Flex Tough – Our Advanced Performance Rubber Polymers are Tested for Extreme Conditions to Ensure they Don't Crack, Split or Deform
No-Slip Grip – Rubberized Nibs on the Bottom so the Mat Does not Move – Ergonomic Grooves on Top to Give your Foot Traction & Comfort
Simple Installation – Place the Mats on the Floor of your Vehicle after Trimming – Easily Remove and Clean the Mats of any Dirt & Spills
Designed for Compatibility – Made to be Trimmable to Fit your Vehicle’s Floor Contours with only a Pair of Scissors
Ideal Fit – Please Check the Dimensions before Installation - Front (27" X 18") Rear (17" X 54") Max Dimensions

specifications.Model: ProLiner Heavy Duty Rubber Black Car Floor Mats Liner for Auto
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars2,806 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
